testsuite.name: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: When I click on "Questions"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Group from the Create New button in the "Questions" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Add Group" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: When I enter a group name of "Test Remove"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I click the "Add Group" dialog button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Questions" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: When I click on "Test Remove" in the "Questions" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Question/Text from the Create New button in the "Test Remove" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Remove Content 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Text" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I click on "Test Remove" in the "Text" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I select the question by name "Remove Content 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I click the "Remove" button in the bulk row
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I click the Confirm option
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Test Remove" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.name: And I do not see the question "Remove Content 3" in the "Test Remove" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Successfully remove content from a group
